public class ObjectCache
extends java.util.Observable

Object for persisting ColdFusion CFCs

Author:
Mark Mandel

ObjectCache

public ObjectCache(java.lang.String className,
                   int maxNumber,
                   int secondsPersisted)
Constructor for a new Object Cache

Parameters:
maxNumber - Maximum number of objects to cache. 0 is unlimited
secondsPersisted - Total number of seconds to persist an object. 0 is forever.

Returns:
whether the object exists, and hasn't expired

Parameters:

get

public coldfusion.runtime.TemplateProxy get(java.lang.String key)
                                     throws ObjectNotFoundException
Retrieve an object from the cache

Parameters:
key - The key to look for
Returns:
The CFC that was stored in here
Throws:
ObjectNotFoundException - If the object doesnt exist in the cache, this is thrown

add

public void add(java.lang.ref.SoftReference softRef,
                java.lang.String key)
Adds an object to the cache

Parameters:
softRef - the soft reference that contains the object
key - The key to store it under. This should be unique
